channel.title: HELP! To get the stuff i added to my client.java do i need to compile?
channel.description: if i need too use the compile...i miss something called javac....and some java.lang or something....help please :eek:

item.title: HELP! To get the stuff i added to my client.java do i need to compile?
item.dc:creator: @apeskape apeskape
item.description:
@apeskape wrote:

well this is probobly your problem, there are environmental variables (start>>rightclick on my computer>>properties>>advanced tab>>environmental variables) under system variables hit new then for the name type in CLASSPATH for the value type in CLASSPATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;. Now click new again on the system variables enter in Path for the name and for the value enter in C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_09\bin click ok and get out of all that stuff and you should be good try running the stuff again.

Read full topic

item.title: HELP! To get the stuff i added to my client.java do i need to compile?
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

The "07" is the update of the Java JDK that you have. It is probably one of 05, 06, 07, 08, or 09. Try them all until one works. This will compile and run your server. No need for runserver.bat anymore.

Did you do that?

-Alexia

item.source: HELP! To get the stuff i added to my client.java do i need to compile?

item.title: HELP! To get the stuff i added to my client.java do i need to compile?
item.dc:creator: @alexia alexia
item.description:
@alexia wrote:

Yes. You do need to compile.

Right click compile.bad, click edit, and insert the code below.

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME Client "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_07\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jre1.5.0_07\bin\java.exe" server pause

The “07” is the update of the Java JDK that you have. It is probably one of 05, 06, 07, 08, or 09. Try them all until one works. This will compile and run your server. No need for runserver.bat anymore.

-Alexia

Read full topic
